Uses of Class
BatchImageEngine.Builder

    • Uses of BatchImageEngine.Builder in <Unnamed>

      Subclasses of BatchImageEngine.Builder in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BatchConsole.BatchImageBuilder
      Following the Builder design pattern, this inner class extends from the inner abstract class Builder of the abstract outer class BatchImageEngine.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return BatchImageEngine.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BatchImageEngine.Builder BatchImageEngine.Builder.convertJPG(boolean convert)
      Sets the program to convert any non-JPG files into a real JPG format.
      BatchImageEngine.Builder BatchImageEngine.Builder.datetime(java.lang.String dt)
      Sets the date and time to modify the Date Taken attribute.
      BatchImageEngine.Builder BatchImageEngine.Builder.descending(boolean desc)
      Enables a flag to sort the copied images in descending order.
      BatchImageEngine.Builder BatchImageEngine.Builder.embedDateTime(boolean emb)
      Appends the date and time attribute to each image file name.
      BatchImageEngine.Builder BatchImageEngine.Builder.fileSet(java.lang.String[] files)
      Defines a collection of image files to be copied instead of the entire files from the source directory.
      BatchImageEngine.Builder BatchImageEngine.Builder.name(java.lang.String prefix)
      Assigns a prefix to be appended to each image file name for organisational identification.
      BatchImageEngine.Builder BatchImageEngine.Builder.skipMedia(boolean media)
      Determines whether media files should be ignored or copied.
      BatchImageEngine.Builder BatchImageEngine.Builder.source(java.lang.String src)
      Sets the source directory containing original image files.
      BatchImageEngine.Builder BatchImageEngine.Builder.target(java.lang.String target)
      Sets the target directory where copied image files are saved to.
      Constructors in <Unnamed> with parameters of type BatchImageEngine.Builder 
      Constructor and Description
      BatchConsole(BatchImageEngine.Builder builder)
      Constructs a new instance of this class, employing a Builder design pattern to process the specified parameters and update the copied image files.
      BatchImageEngine(BatchImageEngine.Builder builder)
      Constructs a BatchImageEngine instance using data from command line arguments, encapsulated in a Builder object.
